1.Name: Spirited Away
1.Credit: Dir: Hayao Miyazaki With: Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Miyu Irino
1.Outline: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

2.Name: The Lion King
2.Credit: Dir: Roger Allers, Rob Minkoff With: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones
2.Outline: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

3.Name: Grave of the Fireflies
3.Credit: Dir: Isao Takahata With: Tsutomu Tatsumi, Ayano Shiraishi, Akemi Yamaguchi
3.Outline: A tragic film covering a young boy and his little sister's struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

4.Name: WALL·E
4.Credit: Dir: Andrew Stanton With: Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin
4.Outline: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

5.Name: Princess Mononoke
5.Credit: Dir: Hayao Miyazaki With: YÃ´ji Matsuda, Yuriko Ishida, YÃ»ko Tanaka
5.Outline: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

6.Name: Zootopia
6.Credit: Dir: Byron Howard, Rich Moore With: Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Idris Elba
6.Outline: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

7.Name: Toy Story 3
7.Credit: Dir: Lee Unkrich With: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack
7.Outline: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

8.Name: Toy Story
8.Credit: Dir: John Lasseter With: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles
8.Outline: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

9.Name: Inside Out
9.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Drama | Family | Fantasy
9.Credit: Dir: Pete Docter, Ronnie Del Carmen With: Amy Poehler, Bill Hader, Lewis Black
9.Outline: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

10.Name: Up
10.Credit: Dir: Pete Docter, Bob Peterson With: Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger
10.Outline: Seventy-eight year old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his home equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

11.Name: My Neighbor Totoro
11.Credit: Dir: Hayao Miyazaki With: Hitoshi Takagi, Noriko Hidaka, Chika Sakamoto
11.Outline: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wonderous forest spirits who live nearby.

12.Name: Howl's Moving Castle
12.Credit: Dir: Hayao Miyazaki With: Chieko BaishÃ´, Takuya Kimura, Tatsuya GashÃ»in
12.Outline: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

13.Name: How to Train Your Dragon
13.Credit: Dir: Dean DeBlois, Chris Sanders With: Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Christopher Mintz-Plasse
13.Outline: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons, becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

14.Name: Mary and Max
14.Credit: Dir: Adam Elliot With: Toni Collette, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Eric Bana
14.Outline: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

15.Name: Finding Nemo
15.Credit: Dir: Andrew Stanton, Lee Unkrich With: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould
15.Outline: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

16.Name: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
16.Credit: Dir: Hayao Miyazaki With: Sumi Shimamoto, Mahito Tsujimura, Hisako KyÃ´da
16.Outline: Warrior/pacifist Princess NausicaÃ¤ desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

17.Name: Castle in the Sky
17.Credit: Dir: Hayao Miyazaki With: Anna Paquin, James Van Der Beek, Cloris Leachman
17.Outline: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

18.Name: Akira
18.Credit: Dir: Katsuhiro Ãtomo With: Nozomu Sasaki, Mami Koyama, Mitsuo Iwata
18.Outline: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two kids and a group of psychics can stop.

19.Name: Monsters, Inc.
19.Credit: Dir: Pete Docter, David Silverman With: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Mary Gibbs
19.Outline: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

20.Name: Persepolis
20.Credit: Dir: Vincent Paronnaud, Marjane Satrapi With: Chiara Mastroianni, Catherine Deneuve, Gena Rowlands
20.Outline: A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

21.Name: Pink Floyd The Wall
21.Credit: Dir: Alan Parker With: Bob Geldof, Christine Hargreaves, James Laurenson
21.Outline: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

22.Name: Beauty and the Beast
22.Credit: Dir: Gary Trousdale, Kirk Wise With: Paige O'Hara, Robby Benson, Jesse Corti
22.Outline: Belle, whose father is imprisoned by the Beast, offers herself instead, unaware her captor to be an enchanted prince.

23.Name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
23.Credit: Dir: Henry Selick With: Danny Elfman, Chris Sarandon, Catherine O'Hara
23.Outline: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but doesn't quite understand the concept.

24.Name: Waltz with Bashir
24.Credit: Dir: Ari Folman With: Ari Folman, Ron Ben-Yishai, Ronny Dayag
24.Outline: An Israeli film director interviews fellow veterans of the 1982 invasion of Lebanon to reconstruct his own memories of his term of service in that conflict.

25.Name: Whisper of the Heart
25.Credit: Dir: Yoshifumi KondÃ´ With: Youko Honna, Issei Takahashi, Takashi Tachibana
25.Outline: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and the boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

26.Name: Ghost in the Shell
26.Credit: Dir: Mamoru Oshii With: Atsuko Tanaka, Iemasa Kayumi, Akio Ãtsuka
26.Outline: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

27.Name: Aladdin
27.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical | Romance
27.Credit: Dir: Ron Clements, John Musker With: Scott Weinger, Robin Williams, Linda Larkin
27.Outline: When a street urchin vies for the love of a beautiful princess, he uses a genie's magic power to make himself off as a prince in order to marry her.

28.Name: Ratatouille
28.Credit: Dir: Brad Bird, Jan Pinkava With: Brad Garrett, Lou Romano, Patton Oswalt
28.Outline: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

29.Name: The Iron Giant
29.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Drama | Family | Sci-Fi
29.Credit: Dir: Brad Bird With: Eli Marienthal, Harry Connick Jr., Jennifer Aniston
29.Outline: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

30.Name: The Incredibles
30.Credit: Dir: Brad Bird With: Craig T. Nelson, Samuel L. Jackson, Holly Hunter
30.Outline: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

31.Name: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
31.Genre: Animation | Action | Crime | Drama | Sci-Fi | Thriller
31.Credit: Dir: ShinichirÃ´ Watanabe With: Beau Billingslea, Melissa Fahn, Nicholas Guest
31.Outline: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

32.Name: Toy Story 2
32.Credit: Dir: John Lasseter, Ash Brannon With: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack
32.Outline: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

33.Name: Ninja Scroll
33.Credit: Dir: Yoshiaki Kawajiri, Kevin Seymour With: Stephen Apostolina, Dean Wein, Wendee Lee
33.Outline: A mysterious vagabond sets out on a journey to confront his past. Little does he know he is up against a demonic force of killers, with a ghost from his past as the leader.

34.Name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
34.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy
34.Credit: Dir: Dean DeBlois With: Jay Baruchel, Cate Blanchett, Gerard Butler
34.Outline: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

35.Name: Shrek
35.Credit: Dir: Andrew Adamson, Vicky Jenson With: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz
35.Outline: After his swamp is filled with magical creatures, an ogre agrees to rescue a princess for a villainous lord in order to get his land back.

36.Name: Big Hero 6
36.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Sci-Fi
36.Credit: Dir: Don Hall, Chris Williams With: Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit, Jamie Chung
36.Outline: The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

37.Name: Kiki's Delivery Service
37.Credit: Dir: Hayao Miyazaki With: Kirsten Dunst, Minami Takayama, Rei Sakuma
37.Outline: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

38.Name: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
38.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Drama | Mystery | Romance | Sci-Fi
38.Credit: Dir: Mamoru Hosoda With: Riisa Naka, Takuya Ishida, Mitsutaka Itakura
38.Outline: A high-school girl acquires the ability to time travel.

39.Name: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
39.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Crime | Drama | Family | Mystery | Romance | Sci-Fi | Thriller
39.Credit: Dir: Eric Radomski, Bruce W. Timm With: Kevin Conroy, Dana Delany, Hart Bochner
39.Outline: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

40.Name: 5 Centimeters Per Second
40.Credit: Dir: Makoto Shinkai With: Kenji Mizuhashi, Yoshimi Kondou, Satomi Hanamura
40.Outline: Told in three interconnected segments, we follow a young man named Takaki through his life as cruel winters, cold technology, and finally, adult obligations and responsibility converge to test the delicate petals of love.

41.Name: The Triplets of Belleville
41.Credit: Dir: Sylvain Chomet With: MichÃ¨le Caucheteux, Jean-Claude Donda, Michel Robin
41.Outline: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

42.Name: Perfect Blue
42.Credit: Dir: Satoshi Kon With: Junko Iwao, Rica Matsumoto, Shinpachi Tsuji
42.Outline: A retired pop-singer-turned-actress' sense of reality is shaken when she is stalked by an obsessed fan and seemingly a ghost of her past.

43.Name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
43.Credit: Dir: Wes Anderson With: George Clooney, Meryl Streep, Bill Murray
43.Outline: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

44.Name: Waking Life
44.Credit: Dir: Richard Linklater With: Ethan Hawke, Trevor Jack Brooks, Lorelei Linklater
44.Outline: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

45.Name: The Wind Rises
45.Credit: Dir: Hayao Miyazaki With: Hideaki Anno, Hidetoshi Nishijima, Miori Takimoto
45.Outline: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

46.Name: Fantasia
46.Credit: Dir: Norman Ferguson With: Leopold Stokowski, Deems Taylor, Corey Burton
46.Outline: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

47.Name: Tangled
47.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical | Romance
47.Credit: Dir: Nathan Greno, Byron Howard With: Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Donna Murphy
47.Outline: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

48.Name: Porco Rosso
48.Credit: Dir: Hayao Miyazaki With: ShÃ»ichirÃ´ Moriyama, Tokiko KatÃ´, Bunshi Katsura Vi
48.Outline: The adventures of "Porco Rosso", a veteran WW1 pilot in 1930s Italy, who has been cursed to look like an anthropomorphic pig.

49.Name: The Lego Movie
49.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy
49.Credit: Dir: Phil Lord, Christopher Miller With: Chris Pratt, Will Ferrell, Elizabeth Banks
49.Outline: An ordinary Lego construction worker, thought to be the prophesied 'Special', is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the Lego universe into eternal stasis.

50.Name: South Park: Bigger Longer & Uncut
50.Credit: Dir: Trey Parker With: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Mary Kay Bergman
50.Outline: When the four boys see an R-rated movie featuring Canadians Terrance & Phillip, they are pronounced "corrupted", and their parents pressure the United States to wage war against Canada.

51.Name: Wreck-It Ralph
51.Credit: Dir: Rich Moore With: John C. Reilly, Jack McBrayer, Jane Lynch
51.Outline: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

52.Name: Paprika
52.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Crime | Mystery | Sci-Fi | Thriller
52.Credit: Dir: Satoshi Kon With: Megumi Hayashibara, TÃ´ru Emori, Katsunosuke Hori
52.Outline: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist can stop it: Paprika.

53.Name: Despicable Me
53.Credit: Dir: Pierre Coffin, Chris Renaud With: Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand
53.Outline: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

54.Name: Ponyo
54.Credit: Dir: Hayao Miyazaki With: Cate Blanchett, Matt Damon, Liam Neeson
54.Outline: An adventure about a five-year-old boy and his relationship with Ponyo, a goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

55.Name: Coraline
55.Credit: Dir: Henry Selick With: Dakota Fanning, Teri Hatcher, John Hodgman
55.Outline: An adventurous girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

56.Name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
56.Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Bob Hoskins, Christopher Lloyd, Joanna Cassidy
56.Outline: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

57.Name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
57.Credit: Dir: William Cottrell, David Hand With: Adriana Caselotti, Harry Stockwell, Lucille La Verne
57.Outline: Snow White, pursued by a jealous queen, hides with the Dwarfs, but the queen learns of this and prepares to feed her a poison apple.

58.Name: The Secret World of Arrietty
58.Credit: Dir: Hiromasa Yonebayashi With: Bridgit Mendler, Amy Poehler, Will Arnett
58.Outline: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their daughter, Arrietty, is discovered.

59.Name: The Jungle Book
59.Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Reitherman With: Phil Harris, Sebastian Cabot, Louis Prima
59.Outline: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

60.Name: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
60.Credit: Dir: Mamoru Oshii With: Akio Ãtsuka, Atsuko Tanaka, Tamio Ãki
60.Outline: In the year 2032, BatÃ´, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.

61.Name: Kung Fu Panda
61.Credit: Dir: Mark Osborne, John Stevenson With: Jack Black, Ian McShane, Angelina Jolie
61.Outline: In the Valley of Peace, Po the Panda finds himself chosen as the Dragon Warrior despite the fact that he is obese and a complete novice at martial arts.

62.Name: The Secret of NIMH
62.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Drama | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
62.Credit: Dir: Don Bluth With: Elizabeth Hartman, Derek Jacobi, Dom DeLuise
62.Outline: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.

63.Name: Robin Hood
63.Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Reitherman With: Brian Bedford, Phil Harris, Roger Miller
63.Outline: The story of the legendary outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.

64.Name: Frozen
64.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical
64.Credit: Dir: Chris Buck, Jennifer Lee With: Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Jonathan Groff
64.Outline: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister, Anna, teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

65.Name: The Little Mermaid
65.Credit: Dir: Ron Clements, John Musker With: Jodi Benson, Samuel E. Wright, Rene Auberjonois
65.Outline: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain with an unscrupulous sea-witch in order to meet a human prince on land.

66.Name: Ice Age
66.Credit: Dir: Chris Wedge, Carlos Saldanha With: Denis Leary, John Leguizamo, Ray Romano
66.Outline: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

67.Name: The Illusionist
67.Credit: Dir: Sylvain Chomet With: Jean-Claude Donda, Eilidh Rankin, Duncan MacNeil
67.Outline: A French illusionist finds himself out of work and travels to Scotland, where he meets a young woman. Their ensuing adventure changes both their lives forever.

68.Name: Mulan
68.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Family | Fantasy | Musical | War
68.Credit: Dir: Tony Bancroft, Barry Cook With: Ming-Na Wen, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong
68.Outline: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

69.Name: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
69.Credit: Dir: Steve Box, Nick Park With: Peter Sallis, Helena Bonham Carter, Ralph Fiennes
69.Outline: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

70.Name: Pinocchio
70.Credit: Dir: Norman Ferguson, T. Hee With: Dickie Jones, Christian Rub, Mel Blanc
70.Outline: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

71.Name: Despicable Me 2
71.Credit: Dir: Pierre Coffin, Chris Renaud With: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Benjamin Bratt
71.Outline: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

72.Name: Alice in Wonderland
72.Credit: Dir: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson With: Kathryn Beaumont, Ed Wynn, Richard Haydn
72.Outline: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

73.Name: Kung Fu Panda 3
73.Credit: Dir: Alessandro Carloni, Jennifer Yuh Nelson With: Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Dustin Hoffman
73.Outline: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to his home.

74.Name: The Simpsons Movie
74.Credit: Dir: David Silverman With: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright
74.Outline: After Homer accidentally pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpson family are declared fugitives.

75.Name: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
75.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
75.Credit: Dir: Tetsuya Nomura, Takeshi Nozue With: Takahiro Sakurai, Ayumi ItÃ´, Shotaro Morikubo
75.Outline: An ex-mercenary is forced out of isolation when three mysterious men kidnap and brainwash the city's children afflicted with the Geostigma disease.

76.Name: The Animatrix
76.Credit: Dir: Peter Chung, Andrew R. Jones With: Clayton Watson, Akio Ãtsuka, Pamela Adlon
76.Outline: The Animatrix is a collection of several animated short films, detailing the backstory of the "Matrix" universe, and the original war between man and machines which led to the creation of the Matrix.

77.Name: Corpse Bride
77.Credit: Dir: Tim Burton, Mike Johnson With: Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Emily Watson
77.Outline: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

78.Name: The Adventures of Tintin
78.Credit: Dir: Steven Spielberg With: Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis, Daniel Craig
78.Outline: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.

79.Name: Bambi
79.Credit: Dir: James Algar, Samuel Armstrong With: Hardie Albright, Stan Alexander, Bobette Audrey
79.Outline: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest after his mother is shot by hunters.

80.Name: Lady and the Tramp
80.Credit: Dir: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson With: Barbara Luddy, Larry Roberts, Peggy Lee
80.Outline: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

81.Name: Monsters University
81.Credit: Dir: Dan Scanlon With: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Steve Buscemi
81.Outline: A look at the relationship between Mike and Sulley during their days at Monsters University -- when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

82.Name: Peter Pan
82.Credit: Dir: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson With: Bobby Driscoll, Kathryn Beaumont, Hans Conried
82.Outline: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

83.Name: The Land Before Time
83.Credit: Dir: Don Bluth With: Pat Hingle, Gabriel Damon, Judith Barsi
83.Outline: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

84.Name: The Transformers: The Movie
84.Credit: Dir: Nelson Shin With: Orson Welles, Robert Stack, Leonard Nimoy
84.Outline: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

85.Name: The Emperor's New Groove
85.Credit: Dir: Mark Dindal With: David Spade, John Goodman, Eartha Kitt
85.Outline: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

86.Name: Rise of the Guardians
86.Credit: Dir: Peter Ramsey With: Hugh Jackman, Alec Baldwin, Isla Fisher
86.Outline: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

87.Name: Sleeping Beauty
87.Credit: Dir: Clyde Geronimi With: Mary Costa, Bill Shirley, Eleanor Audley
87.Outline: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

88.Name: The Cat Returns
88.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Romance
88.Credit: Dir: Hiroyuki Morita With: Chizuru Ikewaki, Yoshihiko Hakamada, Aki Maeda
88.Outline: After helping a cat, a young girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.

89.Name: Cinderella
89.Credit: Dir: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson With: Ilene Woods, James MacDonald, Eleanor Audley
89.Outline: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq, and from her Fairy Godmother.

90.Name: Megamind
90.Credit: Dir: Tom McGrath With: Will Ferrell, Jonah Hill, Brad Pitt
90.Outline: The supervillain Megamind finally defeats his nemesis, the superhero Metro Man. But without a hero, he loses all purpose and must find new meaning to his life.

91.Name: Kung Fu Panda 2
91.Credit: Dir: Jennifer Yuh Nelson With: Jack Black, Angelina Jolie, Jackie Chan
91.Outline: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

92.Name: The Book of Life
92.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Romance
92.Credit: Dir: Jorge R. GutiÃ©rrez With: Diego Luna, Zoe Saldana, Channing Tatum
92.Outline: Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears.

93.Name: Dumbo
93.Credit: Dir: Samuel Armstrong, Norman Ferguson With: Sterling Holloway, Edward Brophy, James Baskett
93.Outline: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

94.Name: The Fox and the Hound
94.Credit: Dir: Ted Berman, Richard Rich With: Mickey Rooney, Kurt Russell, Pearl Bailey
94.Outline: Two childhood friends find themselves forced to become enemies.

95.Name: The Croods
95.Credit: Dir: Kirk De Micco, Chris Sanders With: Nicolas Cage, Ryan Reynolds, Emma Stone
95.Outline: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.

96.Name: Fantasia/2000
96.Credit: Dir: James Algar, GaÃ«tan Brizzi With: James Levine, Steve Martin, Leopold Stokowski
96.Outline: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

97.Name: Rango
97.Credit: Dir: Gore Verbinski With: Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher, Timothy Olyphant
97.Outline: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

98.Name: 101 Dalmatians
98.Credit: Dir: Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske With: Rod Taylor, Betty Lou Gerson, J. Pat O'Malley
98.Outline: When a litter of dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella De Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

99.Name: The Dark Crystal
99.Credit: Dir: Jim Henson, Frank Oz With: Jim Henson, Kathryn Mullen, Frank Oz
99.Outline: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

100.Name: Hercules
100.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical | Romance
100.Credit: Dir: Ron Clements, John Musker With: Tate Donovan, Susan Egan, James Woods
100.Outline: The son of the Greek Gods Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

101.Name: Shrek 2
101.Credit: Dir: Andrew Adamson, Kelly Asbury With: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz
101.Outline: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.

102.Name: The Great Mouse Detective
102.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Family | Music | Mystery | Sci-Fi
102.Credit: Dir: Ron Clements, Burny Mattinson With: Vincent Price, Barrie Ingham, Val Bettin
102.Outline: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy-maker and uncovers its link to his arch-enemy, Professor Ratigan.

103.Name: The Sword in the Stone
103.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical
103.Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Reitherman With: Rickie Sorensen, Sebastian Cabot, Karl Swenson
103.Outline: The wizard Merlin teaches a young boy who is destined to be King Arthur.

104.Name: Tarzan
104.Credit: Dir: Chris Buck, Kevin Lima With: Tony Goldwyn, Minnie Driver, Brian Blessed
104.Outline: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

105.Name: A Bug's Life
105.Credit: Dir: John Lasseter, Andrew Stanton With: Kevin Spacey, Dave Foley, Julia Louis-Dreyfus
105.Outline: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

106.Name: Cars
106.Credit: Dir: John Lasseter, Joe Ranft With: Owen Wilson, Bonnie Hunt, Paul Newman
106.Outline: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

107.Name: Brave
107.Credit: Dir: Mark Andrews, Brenda Chapman With: Kelly Macdonald, Billy Connolly, Emma Thompson
107.Outline: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

108.Name: Lilo & Stitch
108.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Drama | Family | Fantasy | Music | Sci-Fi
108.Credit: Dir: Dean DeBlois, Chris Sanders With: Daveigh Chase, Chris Sanders, Tia Carrere
108.Outline: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive from the law.

109.Name: The Princess and the Frog
109.Credit: Dir: Ron Clements, John Musker With: Anika Noni Rose, Keith David, Oprah Winfrey
109.Outline: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

110.Name: A Scanner Darkly
110.Credit: Dir: Richard Linklater With: Keanu Reeves, Winona Ryder, Robert Downey Jr.
110.Outline: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

111.Name: Enchanted
111.Genre: Animation | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Musical | Romance
111.Credit: Dir: Kevin Lima With: Amy Adams, Susan Sarandon, James Marsden
111.Outline: A princess, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York by an evil queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

112.Name: The AristoCats
112.Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Reitherman With: Phil Harris, Eva Gabor, Sterling Holloway
112.Outline: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

113.Name: Hotel Transylvania
113.Credit: Dir: Genndy Tartakovsky With: Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Andy Samberg
113.Outline: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teen-aged daughter.

114.Name: Anastasia
114.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Drama | Family | Fantasy | Musical | Mystery | Romance
114.Credit: Dir: Don Bluth, Gary Goldman With: Meg Ryan, John Cusack, Christopher Lloyd
114.Outline: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

115.Name: Arthur Christmas
115.Credit: Dir: Sarah Smith, Barry Cook With: James McAvoy, Jim Broadbent, Bill Nighy
115.Outline: Santa's clumsy son Arthur gets put on a mission with St. Nick's father to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than 2 hours.

116.Name: Treasure Planet
116.Credit: Dir: Ron Clements, John Musker With: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Emma Thompson, Martin Short
116.Outline: A Disney animated version of "Treasure Island". The only difference is that the film is set in outer space with alien worlds and other galactic wonders.

117.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Drama | Mystery | Sci-Fi | Thriller
117.Credit: Dir: Shane Acker With: Elijah Wood, Jennifer Connelly, Crispin Glover
117.Outline: A rag doll that awakens in a postapocalyptic future holds the key to humanity's salvation.

118.Name: Balto
118.Credit: Dir: Simon Wells With: Kevin Bacon, Bob Hoskins, Bridget Fonda
118.Outline: An outcast half-wolf risks his life to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

119.Name: Chicken Run
119.Credit: Dir: Peter Lord, Nick Park With: Mel Gibson, Julia Sawalha, Phil Daniels
119.Outline: When a bird "flies" into a chicken farm, the fellow chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

120.Name: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
120.Credit: Dir: Kelly Asbury, Lorna Cook With: Matt Damon, James Cromwell, Daniel Studi
120.Outline: A wild stallion is captured by humans and slowly loses the will to resist training. Yet throughout his struggles for freedom, the stallion refuses to let go of the hope of one day returning home to his herd.

121.Name: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
121.Credit: Dir: Carlos Saldanha, Mike Thurmeier With: Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary
121.Outline: When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him.

122.Name: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
122.Credit: Dir: Stephen Hillenburg, Mark Osborne With: Jeffrey Tambor, Rodger Bumpass, Carolyn Lawrence
122.Outline: SpongeBob SquarePants takes leave from the town of Bikini Bottom in order to track down King Neptune's stolen crown.

123.Name: ParaNorman
123.Credit: Dir: Chris Butler, Sam Fell With: Kodi Smit-McPhee, Anna Kendrick, Christopher Mintz-Plasse
123.Outline: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.

124.Name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
124.Credit: Dir: Phil Lord, Christopher Miller With: Anna Faris, Bill Hader, Bruce Campbell
124.Outline: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

125.Name: Legend of the Guardians: The Owls of Ga'Hoole
125.Credit: Dir: Zack Snyder With: Jim Sturgess, Hugo Weaving, David Wenham
125.Outline: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.

126.Name: The Prince of Egypt
126.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Biography | Drama | Family | Fantasy | Musical
126.Credit: Dir: Brenda Chapman, Steve Hickner With: Val Kilmer, Ralph Fiennes, Michelle Pfeiffer
126.Outline: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and, later his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

127.Name: Rio
127.Credit: Dir: Carlos Saldanha With: Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway, George Lopez
127.Outline: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

128.Name: Frankenweenie
128.Credit: Dir: Tim Burton With: Winona Ryder, Catherine O'Hara, Martin Short
128.Outline: Young Victor conducts a science experiment to bring his beloved dog Sparky back to life, only to face unintended, sometimes monstrous, consequences.

129.Name: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
129.Credit: Dir: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath With: Ben Stiller, Jada Pinkett Smith, Chris Rock
129.Outline: Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman are still fighting to get home to their beloved Big Apple. Their journey takes them through Europe where they find the perfect cover: a traveling circus, which they reinvent - Madagascar style.

130.Name: Madagascar
130.Credit: Dir: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath With: Chris Rock, Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer
130.Outline: Spoiled by their upbringing with no idea what wild life is really like, four animals from New York Central Zoo escape, unwittingly assisted by four absconding penguins, and find themselves in Madagascar, among a bunch of merry lemurs

131.Name: The Rescuers
131.Credit: Dir: John Lounsbery, Wolfgang Reitherman With: Bob Newhart, Eva Gabor, Geraldine Page
131.Outline: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

132.Name: Bolt
132.Credit: Dir: Byron Howard, Chris Williams With: John Travolta, Miley Cyrus, Susie Essman
132.Outline: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.

133.Name: An American Tail
133.Credit: Dir: Don Bluth With: Dom DeLuise, Christopher Plummer, Erica Yohn
133.Outline: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

134.Name: Meet the Robinsons
134.Credit: Dir: Stephen J. Anderson With: Daniel Hansen, Wesley Singerman, Angela Bassett
134.Outline: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

135.Name: Horton Hears a Who!
135.Credit: Dir: Jimmy Hayward, Steve Martino With: Jim Carrey, Steve Carell, Carol Burnett
135.Outline: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.

136.Name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
136.Credit: Dir: Gary Trousdale, Kirk Wise With: Demi Moore, Jason Alexander, Tom Hulce
136.Outline: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

137.Name: The Rescuers Down Under
137.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Crime | Drama | Family | Fantasy | Mystery
137.Credit: Dir: Hendel Butoy, Mike Gabriel With: Bob Newhart, Eva Gabor, John Candy
137.Outline: The R.A.S. agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

138.Name: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
138.Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Ty Burrell, Max Charles, Stephen Colbert
138.Outline: The time-travelling adventures of an advanced canine and his adopted son, as they endeavor to fix a time rift they created.

139.Name: Ice Age: The Meltdown
139.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy
139.Credit: Dir: Carlos Saldanha With: Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary
139.Outline: Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the woolly mammoths.

140.Name: The Road to El Dorado
140.Credit: Dir: Bibo Bergeron, Don Paul With: Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh, Rosie Perez
140.Outline: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

141.Name: The Good Dinosaur
141.Credit: Dir: Peter Sohn With: Jeffrey Wright, Frances McDormand, Maleah Nipay-Padilla
141.Outline: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

142.Name: The Boxtrolls
142.Credit: Dir: Graham Annable, Anthony Stacchi With: Ben Kingsley, Jared Harris, Nick Frost
142.Outline: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator.

143.Name: A Christmas Carol
143.Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Jim Carrey, Gary Oldman, Colin Firth
143.Outline: An animated retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about a Victorian-era miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

144.Name: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
144.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
144.Credit: Dir: Gary Trousdale, Kirk Wise With: Michael J. Fox, Jim Varney, Corey Burton
144.Outline: A young adventurer named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

145.Name: Over the Hedge
145.Credit: Dir: Tim Johnson, Karey Kirkpatrick With: Bruce Willis, Garry Shandling, Steve Carell
145.Outline: A scheming raccoon fools a mismatched family of forest creatures into helping him repay a debt of food, by invading the new suburban sprawl that popped up while they were hibernating...and learns a lesson about family himself.

146.Name: A Goofy Movie
146.Credit: Dir: Kevin Lima With: Bill Farmer, Jason Marsden, Jim Cummings
146.Outline: When Max makes an preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

147.Name: Surf's Up
147.Credit: Dir: Ash Brannon, Chris Buck With: Shia LaBeouf, Zooey Deschanel, Jon Heder
147.Outline: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

148.Name: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
148.Credit: Dir: Mike Judge, Mike de Seve With: Mike Judge, Bruce Willis, Demi Moore
148.Outline: The dimwitted teen duo of Beavis and Butt-Head travel across America in search of their stolen television set.

149.Name: Brother Bear
149.Credit: Dir: Aaron Blaise, Robert Walker With: Joaquin Phoenix, Jeremy Suarez, Rick Moranis
149.Outline: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

150.Name: Hotel Transylvania 2
150.Credit: Dir: Genndy Tartakovsky With: Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez
150.Outline: Dracula and his friends try to bring out the monster in his half human, half vampire grandson in order to keep Mavis from leaving the hotel.

151.Name: Penguins of Madagascar
151.Credit: Dir: Eric Darnell, Simon J. Smith With: Tom McGrath, Chris Miller, Christopher Knights
151.Outline: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private join forces with undercover organization The North Wind to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine from destroying the world as we know it.

152.Name: James and the Giant Peach
152.Credit: Dir: Henry Selick With: Paul Terry, Joanna Lumley, Pete Postlethwaite
152.Outline: An orphan with terrible aunts for guardians, befriends human like bugs who live inside a giant peach, who take the boy on a journey to New York City.

153.Name: Oliver & Company
153.Credit: Dir: George Scribner With: Joey Lawrence, Billy Joel, Cheech Marin
153.Outline: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York.

154.Name: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
154.Credit: Dir: Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath With: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer
154.Outline: The animals try to fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African wildlife refuge, where Alex is reunited with his parents.

155.Name: Epic
155.Credit: Dir: Chris Wedge With: Amanda Seyfried, Josh Hutcherson, BeyoncÃ© Knowles
155.Outline: A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and the forces of evil is taking place. She bands together with a rag-tag group of characters in order to save their world -- and ours.

156.Name: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
156.Credit: Dir: Peter Lord, Jeff Newitt With: Hugh Grant, Salma Hayek, Jeremy Piven
156.Outline: Pirate Captain sets out on a mission to defeat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz for the Pirate of the year Award. The quest takes Captain and his crew from the shores of Blood Island to the foggy streets of Victorian London.

157.Name: All Dogs Go to Heaven
157.Credit: Dir: Don Bluth, Gary Goldman With: Dom DeLuise, Burt Reynolds, Judith Barsi
157.Outline: A dog returns from the dead looking for revenge on his killer using an orphan girl who can talk to animals.

158.Name: Puss in Boots
158.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy
158.Credit: Dir: Chris Miller With: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Zach Galifianakis
158.Outline: The events leading up to the sword fighting cat's meeting with Shrek and his friends.

159.Name: Home
159.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
159.Credit: Dir: Tim Johnson With: Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin
159.Outline: An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.

160.Name: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
160.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Drama | Family | Fantasy | Romance
160.Credit: Dir: Patrick Gilmore, Tim Johnson With: Brad Pitt, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Joseph Fiennes
160.Outline: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace, and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

161.Name: Flushed Away
161.Credit: Dir: David Bowers, Sam Fell With: Hugh Jackman, Kate Winslet, Ian McKellen
161.Outline: The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.

162.Name: Ice Age: Continental Drift
162.Credit: Dir: Steve Martino, Mike Thurmeier With: Ray Romano, Denis Leary, John Leguizamo
162.Outline: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.

163.Name: Monster House
163.Credit: Dir: Gil Kenan With: Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke
163.Outline: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.

164.Name: Pocahontas
164.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Drama | Family | History | Musical | Romance
164.Credit: Dir: Mike Gabriel, Eric Goldberg With: Mel Gibson, Linda Hunt, Christian Bale
164.Outline: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

165.Name: Titan A.E.
165.Credit: Dir: Don Bluth, Gary Goldman With: Matt Damon, Drew Barrymore, Bill Pullman
165.Outline: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

166.Name: The Polar Express
166.Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Tom Hanks, Chris Coppola, Michael Jeter
166.Outline: A young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express. During his adventure he learns about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

167.Name: Antz
167.Credit: Dir: Eric Darnell, Tim Johnson With: Woody Allen, Sharon Stone, Gene Hackman
167.Outline: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

168.Name: Monsters vs. Aliens
168.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Sci-Fi
168.Credit: Dir: Rob Letterman, Conrad Vernon With: Reese Witherspoon, Rainn Wilson, Stephen Colbert
168.Outline: A woman transformed into a giant after she is struck by a meteorite on her wedding day becomes part of a team of monsters sent in by the U.S. government to defeat an alien mastermind trying to take over Earth.

169.Name: Hoodwinked!
169.Credit: Dir: Cory Edwards, Todd Edwards With: Anne Hathaway, Glenn Close, Patrick Warburton
169.Outline: Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Woodsman, and Granny all tell the police the events that lead up to their encounter.

170.Name: Happy Feet
170.Credit: Dir: George Miller, Warren Coleman With: Elijah Wood, Brittany Murphy, Hugh Jackman
170.Outline: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

171.Name: Turbo
171.Credit: Dir: David Soren With: Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti, Maya Rudolph
171.Outline: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

172.Name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
172.Credit: Dir: Cody Cameron, Kris Pearn With: Bill Hader, Anna Faris, Will Forte
172.Outline: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

173.Name: The Lorax
173.Credit: Dir: Chris Renaud, Kyle Balda With: Zac Efron, Taylor Swift, Danny DeVito
173.Outline: A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.

174.Name: Minions
174.Credit: Dir: Kyle Balda, Pierre Coffin With: Sandra Bullock, Jon Hamm, Michael Keaton
174.Outline: Minions Stuart, Kevin and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a super-villain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

175.Name: Dinosaur
175.Credit: Dir: Eric Leighton, Ralph Zondag With: D.B. Sweeney, Julianna Margulies, Samuel E. Wright
175.Outline: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sancturary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

176.Name: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within
176.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Romance | Sci-Fi
176.Credit: Dir: Hironobu Sakaguchi, Motonori Sakakibara With: Alec Baldwin, Steve Buscemi, Ming-Na Wen
176.Outline: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.

177.Name: Rio 2
177.Credit: Dir: Carlos Saldanha With: Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway, Jemaine Clement
177.Outline: It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel and their three kids after they're hurtled from Rio de Janeiro to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel, and meets his father-in-law.

178.Name: Shrek Forever After
178.Credit: Dir: Mike Mitchell With: Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy
178.Outline: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpel rules supreme.

179.Name: Robots
179.Credit: Dir: Chris Wedge, Carlos Saldanha With: Ewan McGregor, Halle Berry, Mel Brooks
179.Outline: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.

180.Name: TMNT
180.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
180.Credit: Dir: Kevin Munroe With: Patrick Stewart, Mako, Chris Evans
180.Outline: When the world is threatened by an ancient evil, the four adolescent turtles must reunite and overcome their faults in order to stand against it.

181.Name: Cars 2
181.Credit: Dir: John Lasseter, Brad Lewis With: Owen Wilson, Larry the Cable Guy, Michael Caine
181.Outline: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

182.Name: Space Jam
182.Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Sport
182.Credit: Dir: Joe Pytka With: Michael Jordan, Wayne Knight, Theresa Randle
182.Outline: Michael Jordan agrees to help the Looney Tunes play a basketball game vs. alien slavers to determine their freedom.

183.Name: Beowulf
183.Credit: Dir: Robert Zemeckis With: Ray Winstone, Crispin Glover, Angelina Jolie
183.Outline: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel who is terrorizing Denmark, and later, Grendel's mother, who begins killing out of revenge.

184.Name: Open Season
184.Credit: Dir: Roger Allers, Jill Culton With: Ashton Kutcher, Martin Lawrence, Debra Messing
184.Outline: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear, finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.

185.Name: Bee Movie
185.Credit: Dir: Steve Hickner, Simon J. Smith With: Jerry Seinfeld, RenÃ©e Zellweger, Matthew Broderick
185.Outline: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them.

186.Name: The Tale of Despereaux
186.Credit: Dir: Sam Fell, Robert Stevenhagen With: Matthew Broderick, Emma Watson, Dustin Hoffman
186.Outline: The tale of three unlikely heroes - a misfit mouse who prefers reading books to eating them, an unhappy rat who schemes to leave the darkness of the dungeon, and a bumbling servant girl with cauliflower ears - whose fates are intertwined with that of the castle's princess.

187.Name: Planet 51
187.Credit: Dir: Jorge Blanco, Javier Abad With: Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Jessica Biel
187.Outline: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.

188.Name: Shrek the Third
188.Credit: Dir: Chris Miller, Raman Hui With: Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy
188.Outline: When his new father-in-law, King Harold falls ill, Shrek is looked at as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away. Not one to give up his beloved swamp, Shrek recruits his friends Donkey and Puss in Boots to install the rebellious Artie as the new king. Princess Fiona, however, rallies a band of royal girlfriends to fend off a coup d'etat by the jilted Prince Charming.

189.Name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
189.Credit: Dir: Paul Tibbitt, Mike Mitchell With: Tom Kenny, Antonio Banderas, Bill Fagerbakke
189.Outline: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

190.Name: Arthur and the Invisibles
190.Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Freddie Highmore, Mia Farrow, Madonna
190.Outline: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, a tiny people living in harmony with nature.

191.Name: Shark Tale
191.Credit: Dir: Bibo Bergeron, Vicky Jenson With: Will Smith, Robert De Niro, RenÃ©e Zellweger
191.Outline: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidently killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother both decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

192.Name: Gnomeo & Juliet
192.Credit: Dir: Kelly Asbury With: James McAvoy, Emily Blunt, Maggie Smith
192.Outline: The neighboring gardens of Montague and Capulet are at war, but the gnomes, Gnomeo and Juliet, are in love.

193.Name: Happy Feet 2
193.Credit: Dir: George Miller, Gary Eck With: Elijah Wood, Robin Williams, Pink
193.Outline: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

194.Name: Stuart Little
194.Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Michael J. Fox, Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie
194.Outline: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

195.Name: The Ant Bully
195.Credit: Dir: John A. Davis With: Paul Giamatti, Nicolas Cage, Julia Roberts
195.Outline: After Lucas Nickle floods an ant colony with his watergun, he's magically shrunken down to insect size and sentenced to hard labor in the ruins.

196.Name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
196.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Thriller
196.Credit: Dir: Dave Filoni With: Matt Lanter, Nika Futterman, Tom Kane
196.Outline: Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano must rescue the kidnapped son of Jabba the Hutt, but political intrigue complicates their mission.

197.Name: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
197.Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Family | Sci-Fi | Sport
197.Credit: Dir: Kunihiko Yuyama, Michael Haigney With: Veronica Taylor, Rachael Lillis, Eric Stuart
197.Outline: Scientists genetically create a new PokÃ©mon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

198.Name: Chicken Little
198.Credit: Dir: Mark Dindal With: Zach Braff, Joan Cusack, Garry Marshall
198.Outline: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

199.Name: Planes
199.Credit: Dir: Klay Hall With: Carlos Alazraqui, Dane Cook, Stacy Keach
199.Outline: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.

200.Name: Pixels
200.Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Michelle Monaghan
200.Outline: When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games.

201.Name: The Smurfs
201.Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Hank Azaria, Katy Perry, Jonathan Winters
201.Outline: When the evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue Smurfs out of their village, they tumble from their magical world into New York City.

202.Name: The Smurfs 2
202.Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Neil Patrick Harris, Jayma Mays, Katy Perry
202.Outline: The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been kidnapped by Gargamel since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation - creatures called the Naughties - into real Smurfs.

203.Name: Stuart Little 2
203.Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Michael J. Fox, Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie
203.Outline: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

204.Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks
204.Credit: Dir: Tim Hill With: Jason Lee, David Cross, Cameron Richardson
204.Outline: A struggling songwriter named Dave Seville finds success when he comes across a trio of singing chipmunks: mischievous leader Alvin, brainy Simon, and chubby, impressionable Theodore.

205.Name: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
205.Credit: Dir: Tim Hill With: Breckin Meyer, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Billy Connolly
205.Outline: Jon and Garfield visit the United Kingdom, where a case of mistaken cat identity finds Garfield ruling over a castle. His reign is soon jeopardized by the nefarious Lord Dargis, who has designs on the estate.

206.Name: Garfield
206.Credit: Dir: Peter Hewitt With: Breckin Meyer, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Stephen Tobolowsky
206.Outline: Jon Arbuckle buys a second pet, a dog named Odie. However, Odie is then abducted and it is up to Jon's cat, Garfield, to find and rescue the canine.

207.Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
207.Credit: Dir: Betty Thomas With: Jason Lee, Zachary Levi, David Cross
207.Outline: The world famous singing pre-teen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.
